ABOUT MOE CLEAN & MORE

My name is Maureen Nauslar, I started Moe Clean & More in 1995 to support my son's choice of sport, to be a competitive gymnast. While working full time at KWCH-TV, I started cleaning for co-workers; many whom I still clean for. I was laid off in 2009 and decided to go Full-Time with Moe Clean & More and bring in co-workers to help Moe Clean & More grow. It is now 2016 and I am very happy with the choices I made; that made Moe Clean & More a successful company!


● I am a reliable and honest person that has an eye for detail. I work hard to give my customers what they expect & pay for.


● I am affordable; this is a competitive business and we work hard to give you a quality cleaning!

RESIDENTIAL & BUSINESS

Why Moe Clean & More?
We can do more then keep your house clean...We can organize closets or cupboards, walk your dog, pick up your dog waste, do yard work, run errands, go grocery shopping, baby-sit your animals when your on vacation, we can help you pack or unpack if moving, whatever you need. We can discuss your needs when we meet to give you a free estimate.


Experience cleaning hard wood, laminate, linoleum, tile, glazed brick, glazed concrete floors. I understand the importance of damp mop not wet or dripping and the proper products to be used on the type of floor being cleaned.

SCHEDULE YOUR FREE ESTIMATE

Bathrooms
Thoroughly cleaned, shower door, tile walls, bathtubs, vanity and sinks including all chrome fixtures, toilets cleaned and sanitized, fronts of cabinets dusted and or damp wipe as needed, general dusting, including removing floor vents to dust and vacuum out, baseboards dusted or damped wiped, wipe light switches and electrical outlets, cobwebs removed from ceilings and corners, mirrors, windows including glass, window sills, ledges & blinds, doors and door frames spot cleaned, floors swept or vacuumed and mopped/sanitized.


Kitchens
Thoroughly cleaned, general dusting, including removing floor vents to dust and vacuum out, all light switches and electrical outlets wiped, baseboards dusted or damped wiped, counter tops and back splashes sanitized, sinks sanitized, including your drain, chrome shined, fronts of all appliances wiped , wipe out refrigerator, unless asked to do a complete clean, microwaves inside and out, stove and stove range, drip pans included, fronts of cabinets, wood oiled or damp wiped, wipe table and all chairs including frame and legs, windows, glass, ledges, sills and blinds, cobwebs removed from ceiling and corners, doors and door frames spot cleaned, vacuumed or swept and mopped/sanitized.


Sleeping & Living areas
All baseboards dusted or damped wiped, flat surfaces dusted/wiped, while moving objects not dusting around it, all doors and door frames spot cleaned, all cobwebs removed from ceilings and corners, all picture frames, glass fronts, wiped/not sprayed, with a damp Windex towel, all ceiling fans, lamps and lamp shades, all knickknacks, curio cabinets, windows, glass, ledges, sills and blinds, front door glass and sliding doors, all stairs vacuumed, furniture including under cushions vacuumed, vacuum & or sweep and mop floors; we move furniture/decor to sweep/mop as allowed, We will change your bed sheets, duvet covers, blankets, wash/dry and replace all bedding...personal laundry as time permits.

SCHEDULE YOUR FIRST CLEANING

WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING

  • I like the energy boost that having a clean home gives me and I am happy that I can have the satisfaction that comes from having a clean home!
  • Very professional and courteous; the house was left smelling pleasantly clean but not aggressively sanitized.

LOOKING FOR A JOB?

Must be honest and dependable; showing up to jobs on the set day and time that is scheduled by the customer.


Highly energetic person, must be a quick learner, must be able to multi-task and capable of completing work in a timely manner. Dress is casual as long as you are well groomed.


● Must have your own car!


● Must have a cell phone!


● P/T positions available. Hours vary from 8am-5pm, Sun.-Sat.


Competitive hourly wage. Will receive an advance in pay when you are capable of working at houses without supervision. Then you will receive a 6 a month review and a raise at your 1 year review anniversary, as merited. Paid daily as jobs are completed.
